text: Judgment on the Nations
Come near, nations, to hear;
and peoples, listen attentively!
Let the earth hear, and that which fills it;
\add the\add* world and all its offspring.
For \add the\add* anger of Yahweh \add is\add* against all the nations,
and \add his\add* wrath \add is\add* against all their armies;
he has put them under a ban,
he has given them up for slaughter.
And their slain shall be cast out;
as for\f + \fr 34:3 \ft Or “and” \f* their corpses, their stench shall go up.
And \add the\add* mountains shall melt with\f + \fr 34:3 \ft Or “from” \f* their blood,
and all the host of heaven shall rot.
And the skies shall roll up like \add a\add* scroll,
and all their host shall wither
like the withering of a leaf from a vine,
or\f + \fr 34:4 \ft Or “and” \f* like \add the\add* withering from a fig tree.
When my sword is drenched in the heavens,
look! It will descend upon Edom,
and upon the people of my ban, for judgment.
⸤Yahweh has a sword⸥;\f + \fr 34:6 \ft Literally “A sword for Yahweh” \f*
it is full \add of\add* blood.
It is covered with\f + \fr 34:6 \ft Or “from” \f* fat,
with\f + \fr 34:6 \ft Or “from” \f* \add the\add* blood of lambs and goats,
with\f + \fr 34:6 \ft Or “from” \f* \add the\add* fat of \add the\add* kidneys of rams,
for ⸤Yahweh has a sacrifice⸥\f + \fr 34:6 \ft Literally “a sacrifice for Yahweh” \f* in Bozrah
and a great slaughter in the land of Edom.
And wild oxen shall go down with them,
and steers with strong bulls.
And their land shall be drenched with\f + \fr 34:7 \ft Or “from” \f* blood,
and their soil shall be fattened with\f + \fr 34:7 \ft Or “from” \f* fat.
For ⸤Yahweh has a day of vengeance⸥,\f + \fr 34:8 \ft Literally “a day of vengeance for Yahweh” \f*
a year of retribution for the strife of Zion.
And its streams shall be changed to pitch and its soil to sulfur,
and its land shall become like burning pitch.
Night and day it shall not be quenched;
its smoke shall go up forever.
From generation to generation it shall be in ruins;
forever and ever there will be no one who passes through her.
But\f + \fr 34:11 \ft Or “And” \f* \add the\add* large bird and \add the\add* hedgehog shall take possession of it,
and \add the\add* owl and \add the\add* raven shall live in it.
And he shall stretch \add the\add* measuring line of confusion out over it,
and \add the\add* plumb line of emptiness.
Its nobles—but no kingdom is there—shall call,
and all its princes shall be nothing.
And thorns shall go up her citadel fortress,
weeds\f + \fr 34:13 \ft Hebrew “weed” \f* and thistle plants\f + \fr 34:13 \ft Hebrew “thistle plant” \f* in her fortresses;
and it shall be \add the\add* settlement of jackals,
green grass for \add the\add* daughters of an ostrich.
And desert creatures shall meet with hyenas,
and a goat-demon shall call to his neighbor;
surely there Lilith\f + \fr 34:14 \ft Hebrew transliteration; possibly a proper name for a Mesopotamian night-demon \f* shall repose,
and she shall find a resting place for herself.
There \add the\add* owl shall nest and lay
and hatch and care for her chicks in her shadow;
surely there \add the\add* birds of prey shall be gathered,
each one \add with\add* her mate.
Seek from the book of Yahweh and ⸤read⸥;\f + \fr 34:16 \ft Literally “call” \f*
none of these shall be missing;
none shall miss her mate.
For my\f + \fr 34:16 \ft The Dead Sea Scroll has “his” \f* mouth ⸤is the one that⸥\f + \fr 34:16 \ft Literally “he” \f* has commanded,
and his spirit ⸤is the one that⸥\f + \fr 34:16 \ft Literally “he” \f* has gathered them.
And he ⸤is the one that⸥\f + \fr 34:17 \ft Literally “he” \f* has cast \add the\add* lot for them,
and his hand has apportioned it to them with the measuring line;
they shall take possession of it forever,
they shall live in it ⸤from generation to generation⸥.\f + \fr 34:17 \ft Literally “to generation and generation” \f*
